title: Missed blocks because of high GetBeaconBlock duration
body:

# ðŸ’Ž Issue

We've missed two blocks in the last day (on different bn/vc nodes pairs) because GetBeaconBlock took 3.5 and 5 seconds.
We're running prysm 4.0.8 on dedicated servers (8c/16t 32GB ram, nvme ssds) and there are plenty of resources (cpu <20% used, disk I/O < 5%) however in these two occasions the GetBeaconBlock function took enough time to miss/orphan the block. Btw I'm using the parallel build flag.
I've checked the different metrics (process_attestations_milliseconds, new_att_head_milliseconds...) that are observed within that function but couldn't find any strange value. I've also checked go metrics (goroutines, gc, etc...) and are all normal.

BN logs are:
```
{"level":"info","msg":"Begin building block","prefix":"rpc/validator","sinceSlotStartTime":23264605,"slot":7400522,"time":"2023-09-25T08:24:47Z"}
{"blockHash":"0x713a10a1b235362465494c4c8eda28b329c8d84b3546e551cad7e8a25b647370","builderPubKey":"0xa1559ace749633b997cb3fdacffb890aeebdb0f5a3b6aaa7eeeaf1a38af0a8fe88b9e4b1f61f236d2e64d95733327a62","level":"info","msg":"Received header with bid","prefix":"rpc/validator","sinceSlotStartTime":174809064,"slot":7400522,"time":"2023-09-25T08:24:47Z","validator":661052,"value":"25338793725767838"}
{"beaconStateRoot":"0x005609579a052e8f1fdb041c263a3dcbe88990d69d10320c3589a441b1f71e16","level":"debug","msg":"Computed state root","prefix":"rpc/validator","time":"2023-09-25T08:24:52Z"}
{"level":"info","msg":"Finished building block","prefix":"rpc/validator","sinceSlotStartTime":5004925564,"slot":7400522,"time":"2023-09-25T08:24:52Z","validator":661052}
```

```
{"id":"0xe7563bc3cd8d68c1","lvl":"info","msg":"Stopping work on payload","reason":"delivery","t":"2023-09-25T08:24:47.032083089Z"}
```

Are there any metrics that can help find out what took the most? It usually takes a couple hundred ms so it's weird it took so much this time (on multiple servers too).
@0xalex88 and us talked offline and this was due to deposit. We have a new release coming to fix this
I can also confirm that the new alpha version fixed the problem, no more missed blocks
Thanks, I'll close this for now. Feel free to reopen it if it happens
